title.value: Комплекс фитофагов - вредителей голубики узколистной в начальный период возделывания в условиях Беларуси
Complex of phytophags – lowbush blueberry pests during initial cultivating period in the conditions of Belarus

subject.value: etapas de desarrollo de la planta

person.name: Sautkin, F.V., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Gordei, D.V., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Morozov, O.V., Belarus State Technological Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Buga, S.V., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The structure of a phytophags complex – pests of a lowbush blueberry (V. angustifolium) in an initial stage of its cultivation in the conditions of Belarus have been determined. At least 27 kinds of phytophhags, among which there are 1 kind of mite and 26 – insects, are revealed.  The majority of phytophags belongs to the number of the gnawing forms damaging sheet plates and growing shoots. In aspect of fodder specialization spread short specialized phytophags prevail. Relatively specialized phytophags of heath flowered are presented by individual kinds. At a current stage of the formation the phytophags complex of lowbush blueberry is made exclusively by representatives of native fauna of Belarus.
